title: All The Time in the World.mp3
description:
Radio adaptation of the Arthur C Clarke short story.

A small time crook is contacted by a stranger and given a list of priceless articles to steal from London museums. How is he to do it? Simple - the stranger has the power to make time stand still. But who is the stranger and why does she want these particular objects?

The denouement when it comers - and there is a clue early in the story - is thought provoking at least.
